hero.title: Rebuilding Syrian Schools
hero.subtitle: Together for Education
hero.description: A comprehensive platform connecting schools in need with resources and support for reconstruction and development
hero.mission: Join us in rebuilding Syria's educational infrastructure and creating a brighter future for our children

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: A simple process to connect schools with the resources they need

step1.title: Register Your School
step1.description: School principals can register their institution and submit detailed information about their needs and current status

step2.title: Review & Verification
step2.description: Our team reviews submissions to ensure authenticity and prioritize the most urgent needs

step3.title: Connect & Rebuild
step3.description: We connect verified schools with donors, organizations, and resources to begin the rebuilding process

mission.title: Our Mission & Values
mission.description: We are committed to rebuilding Syria's educational infrastructure with transparency, quality, and community focus

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Complete transparency in all our operations, from need assessment to project completion, ensuring accountability at every step

education.title: Quality Education
education.description: Ensuring every Syrian child has access to quality education in safe, well-equipped learning environments

infrastructure.title: Sustainable Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Building schools that will last, with modern facilities and equipment that support 21st-century learning

cta2.title: Ready to Make a Difference?
cta2.description: Join thousands of educators, donors, and volunteers working together to rebuild Syria's schools

footer.initiative: An initiative by the Syrian Ministry of Education to rebuild and modernize schools across Syria
